thread.title: Clinton backs Obama's move to keep US forces in Afghanistan
thread.title_full: Clinton backs Obama's move to keep US forces in Afghanistan - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Ken Thomas, Associated Press
title: Clinton backs Obama's move to keep US forces in Afghanistan
text: Photo: Mary Schwalm, AP Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton speaks during a town hall meeting, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, in Keene, N.H. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton speaks... KEENE, N.H. (AP) — Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton said Friday she supports President Barack Obama's decision to keep 5,500 U.S. troops in Afghanistan when he leaves the White House in 2017. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton speaks during a town hall meeting, Friday, Oct. 16, 2015, in Keene, N.H. Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton speaks... KEENE, N.H. (AP) — Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Rodham Clinton said Friday she supports President Barack Obama's decision to keep 5,500 U.S. troops in Afghanistan when he leaves the White House in 2017.
